| HistoryText             = The Graces came to be when [[Gamora Zen Whoberi Ben Titan (Earth-7528)|Gamora]] humbled by the universe's great powers withdrew to the planet [[Godthab Omega]]. She carved out a retreat in the most inhospitable and treacherous mountain range on the planet.
Establishing her seat of power at [[Mount Virago]]. She brought together other females, all of
whom have some type of cosmic awareness. 

The came to see her as Gamora as a living goddess. Finding a new purpose with her acolytes, Gamora directed her Graces to systematically take over every settlement on Godthab.{{r|Annihilation: Ronan Vol 1 2}} The Graces took heavy casualties when the [[Annihilation Wave (Earth-616)|Annihilation Wave]] hit Godthab Omega, though both their stronghold and the Graces as a group survived.{{r|Annihilation: Ronan Vol 1 4}}
